title: Reviewing Platform
description: A comprehensive platform for salary reviews process. It is a web applciation allowing database connections to various HR system. Its built using react and node.js. It is a full stack application with a database connection to MongoDB.

title: This Website :)
description: I always wanted to have a personal website, and now I have one! I built this website using Typescript and is deployed via Vercel. I used Next.js for the front-end. I am planning to add more features to this website in the future.
